dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1593 IH: CAFE Standards Repeal Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Williams introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To repeal the corporate average fuel economy standards.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the CAFE Standards Repeal Act of 2017.

section.header: Repealing the corporate average fuel economy standards
section.text: Chapter 329 of title 49, United States Code, and the item relating to such chapter in the analysis of chapters for subtitle VI of such title, are repealed.
